options.text: embryo implantation after in vitro fertilization
egg implantation for in vivo fertilization
embryo implantation after in vitro fertilization
egg implantation after in vitro fertilization

solution.text: ART's (Assisted Reproductive Technologies) are various techniques which help couples to have children. Examples of such techniques are GIFT (Gamete Intra Fallopian Transfer), ZIFT (Zygote Intra Fallopian Transfer), AI (Artificial Insemination), IUT (Intra Uterine Transfer), ICSI (Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection) etc. In GIFT the gametes are collected and placed in the fallopian tube. The gametes are in fallopian tube because these are not yet fertilized.
